name: Little Infantry
description:
Prepare to play the role of an ant trying to protect your ant hill from the falling debris being discarded by the humans of Central Park. You must build turrets in order to destroy the debris before it hits your base.

The Team:

Leads:

Hanna Richards- Lead Designer

Victor Robles- Lead Artist

Alec Carter- Lead Programmer

Richard Reed- Lead Programmer

Designers:

Jasmine Ronquist (1st Time Jammer)

Artists:
